contentrichtext.text: '''Brętowo''' ({{lang-de|Brentau}}) is one of the quarters of the city of [[Gdańsk]], [[Poland]]. It includes 2 housing estates, Niedźwiednik and Matemblewo, that are located inside [[Oliwa forests]]. The old (now-closed) railway track from [[Wrzeszcz]] (Langfuhr) to [[Kartuzy]] (Karthaus) goes through the quarter, with [[Gdańsk Brętowo (PKP station)]] being the former station. As few railway bridges were destroyed, the remaining bridges are used by alpinists to train. ==External links== * [http://gis.gdansk.pl/dziel/d-12.htm Map of Brętowo] * [http://sabaoth.infoserve.pl/danzig-online/plan/map7a.jpg Old map of Brentau] {{Gdańsk}} {{Pomorze-geo-stub}} {{coord|54|22|N|18|34|E|display=title|region:PL_type:city_source:GNS-enwiki}} [[Category:Districts of Gdańsk]] {{DEFAULTSORT:Bretowo}}
